danata wada nima keremin pawathina polonnaruwa, kilinochchiya ha rathnapura yana disthrikkayanhi gabada sankirna 2018 warshaya thula kriyathmaka kirimata apeksha kerena athara, ema gabada sankirnayanhi meheyum katayuthu sidu kirima sandaha pradeshiya sanwardhana bankuwa samanga kalamanakarana konthrath giwisumwalata elambaime balaya adala disthrik lekamwarun wetha pawarimatath, ema katayuthu niyamanaya ha adhikshanaya kirima eki disthrikkawala disthrik lekamwarun wetha pawarimatath mudal ha janamadhya amathya mangala samarawira mathithuma idiripath kala yojana amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

mohu nokiya kiyasitinne parlimenthuwe bahutharaya matha pamanak rate palanaya gena ya yuthu bawaya.eya aandukrama wyawasthawata patahani wuwada parlimenthuwe bahutharaya matha thindu thirana gathayuthu bawaya.apa rate widhayakawath ithihasaye melesa aandukrama wyawasthawata abhiyoga kara athi awasthawak nam nathiwa athi.mulu ratama ekama chanda kottashayak lesa salaka bahuthara kamaththa matha janadhipathiwarayek thorapath karaganne rata palanaya kirimataya.niwaradima lesa nam rata karawima sandahaya.ee anuwa aanduwak nirmanaya kirima janapathige karyak saha aanduwa wenuwen wagakima daranneda janapathiya.saralawama kiyanawanam rate janathawata awashya paridi aanduwa karawima janapathige karyayi.eya ithamath hondin aandukrama wyawasthawe pahadiliwa atha.agamathiwaraya pathkirimedi parlimenthuwe mathaya wimasimata ho awashya wanne natha.

me loku ayiya gana mata tikak amuththak danuna.me wage nithiwirodi wada karana kisima kenek mewage karunika naha.eth mawa podi ekek nisada nathnam wena deyak nisada mata ee hati sara wara kale naha.eth ohuge guptha bawa nisa man wadiya ohuth ekka mithra wenna giye na.ada ra wenadata wada diga wadi weyi kiyala danuna.hama karadarayakma ekata windapu anjanawa nathiwa mata monawayin monawa weyida.eth anjanata monawa karala athda kalen eliyata aran giyada nathnam thaththata wunu de me ahinsakayata wunoth ithin ee siyalu awasanawantha dewal wenna pradanama hethuwa mage waradda.
